title: Greetings from Avalanche!
content: Hi friends! This is Tifa and I am a software engineer at Avalanche! I'll be sharing our new tech and developments on this blog! Check out our website for updated news about Avalanche!

title: Shy Freelance Dev
content: Hey. Name's Cloud and I am a freelance web developer. Looking to share any knowledge I have, and learn from you all as well. You can check out my work at github.com/cstrife. Don't do great in-person, so glad to be here on this platform.

title: CSS Specificity
content: Just wanted to share an article on CSS Specificity to all those out there learning the ins and outs of CSS! https://www.nicchan.me/blog/css-specificity-for-beginners/ . It was really helpful seeing specificity through the analogy of being a teacher addressing specific students in an auditorium full of them. Give it a read!
